text.title: part8_The Raveonettes on love, death, desire and war

s.hi:
DS : What would bother you more in bed , somebody who is overly
flatulent
, or somebody who speaks in a little baby voice ?

p.s: I never really liked that so much .
Nah , the baby voice is fine .

God , let 's see ... would
least
want to share the bed with ?
I think probably the baby voice would probably bother me the most .

s.hi: DS : Creep you out a bit ?
DS : Sharin do you find it difficult dating ?

p.s: Obviously because you are away so much it really takes a lot of work to keep things intimate with people I am seeing when I 'm away on the road .

s.hi: DS : How do you try to circumvent those problems ?

p.s: I try and keep on tour only three weeks at a time .
Which does n't work all the time ...
I try to keep it to that and have some free time at home , which is typically , like , four days .
And then I try to communicate a lot with the phone .

hi.s: What traits do you deplore in other people ?

s.hi: DS : Any certain type of ignorance ?

p.s: Yeah , ignorance of people around them and of the world .

hi.s: Which traits do you deplore in yourselves ?

s.hi: DS : Are you really all those things ?
DS : And you deplore that about yourself ?
DS : Do you do anything to get over those things ?

p.s: Yeah , I try , but it 's not so easy .

s.hi:
DS : But I 've read interviews with you where you talk about the wild party scene in
Los Angeles
...
DS : Yeah , in preparation for this I read where you talked about that in an interview ...

p.s: That must have been me back in the day ! I 'm old now , you know , settled and I do n't go out now anymore .
I like to have fun , we have a lot of fun .
I really like myself a lot , actually .
I 'm in a very good state ; I have my wife and I 'm very happy and positive ...

s.hi: DS : Is that the trait that you deplore in him ?
DS : Is there a trait that you deplore in Sharin ?

p.s: Well , she 's late , and I hate that .
